meanings.definition: The act of playing the sport of bowling.
meanings.sent1: We had so much fun at the bowlings alley.
meanings.sent2: Let's go to the bowlings center this weekend.
meanings.sent3: The bowlings competition was intense but hilarious.
meanings.sent4: Her bowlings technique was as smooth as a river flowing.
meanings.sent5: The sound of bowlings pins falling echoed through the hall.

meanings.definition: The round, usually wooden or plastic object used in the sport of bowling.
meanings.sent1: The bowlings rolled perfectly down the lane.
meanings.sent2: He picked up the spare with the same bowlings.
meanings.sent3: The colorful bowlings were a hit with the kids.
meanings.sent4: The bowlings gleamed under the bright lights of the alley.
meanings.sent5: She held the bowlings with a steady hand, ready to strike.

meanings.definition: The area or lane where the sport of bowling is played.
meanings.sent1: The bowlings lane was smooth and well-maintained.
meanings.sent2: Players gathered around the bowlings area, eager to start.
meanings.sent3: The bowlings alley was packed with cheering fans.
meanings.sent4: The bowlings lane stretched out like a path to victory.
meanings.sent5: The lights above the bowlings area flickered with excitement.
